body.p: A wolf was prowling around the forest and came across a straw house. He thought to himself, "that looks like it would be easy to blow down!" The wolf prowling around the forest
He looked inside the straw house and saw the first little piggie. He thought, "Wow! I know what I am having for dinner!"

He knocked on the door and said:
The first little piggie replied, seeing the wolf's pointy ears through the peep hole:
The wolf was angry, he replied:
The straw house was blown away by the wolf. The first little piggie squealed in fear! The wolf went to take a bite out of the first little piggie...
But the wolf tripped over the lazy piggies couch! The piggie ran away to the second little piggies house made of sticks.
And the first little piggie, who was fat from sitting on the couch all day, could not run fast enough and the wolf had a yummy pork dinner!
